item.description: Opening for the Steampunk Bizarre Exhibit: "The Unknown" FROM THE MARK TWAIN HOUSE WEBSITE: We open Dr. Grymm Laboratories' exhibit of 18 artists who explore the unknown alternative world of Steampunk and Mark Twain. (Steampunk is a genre that combines Victorian technology and science fiction, pioneered by Twain and Jules Verne, and enjoying a resurgence today.) At this event, we'll be showing the world premier of the movie "I Am Steampunk" from 5-6 in our auditorium, then music by Psych Corp from 6:15-7 while you enjoy the art! For more information, http://www.marktwainh...

group.name: Beyond the Multiplex: Hartford's Indie and Foreign Film fans

item.name: "I am Steampunk" world premiere
